data.text: @TanmayeeNettem Hi @TanmayeeNettem, to obtain information on the status of your baggage, we invite you to use our online tracing tool. We will do our best to deliver your baggage asap. Yvonne

@sjksanders Hello KatherineSandersIcons. In order to comply with the current data protection rules, kindly provide the complete name of all the passengers and the ticket number registered in the booking you need help with. Will wait for your reply.

data.text: @thomasheadon Hi, @thomasheadon. We regret to learn about this incident and thank you for informing us. Could you please send us your Property Irregularity Report (PIR) reference number, similar to CDGAF12345 or your baggage tag number by DM so we can assist you accordingly?

@MOURDI_ZOUHEYR Hi MZ, choose a baggage option in "My Booking"! Depending on the option you select, you can pay online or at the airport on your departure date. If you purchase your options at least 24 hours before your flight's scheduled departure, you will benefit from a discounted rate!Yvonne

@RyderSravan Hello @RyderSravan, we regret this incident at the arrival of your flight. Did you make your loss report online via https://t.co/3hkfTenx5h
We remain at your disposal in private messaging if needed.

urls.title: Bagage manquant ou endommagé | Air France
urls.description: Air France vous indique comment procéder si votre bagage ne vous a pas été restitué à l'aéroport d'arrivée. Vos bagages ont été endommagés au cours d'un vol ? Air France vous conseille et vous informe.

data.text: @sjw_inted Dear Steve, this service is temporarily unavailable. As of March 2020, these options have not been available due to the current health situation. We hope to resume starting in 2023. Thank you

@sassys8n Hi Kristen, we regret we cannot inform you differently. You may use this link https://t.co/wM1v6GJKcS, and to get the number of your current location, just click 'In which country or region where you meant to collect your baggage?' Drop-down. We remain available in DM. Yvonne

@NTommis Hello Nathan, we apologise for the circumstances. Did you already require specific assistance? We invite you to contact our customer support team on Facebook Messenger or Twitter (DM).
Have a great day, Yvonne

data.text: @Jennyseymour3 Hello @Jennyseymour3, due to the current high volume of requests, response times are being extended. We apologise for this issue. If your message concerns a refund request, we invite you to consult the ongoing file on the page: https://t.co/9YTu68M9df

@Larry_bo123 Hello @Larry_bo123, if you require specific assistance with your refund request, we invite you to contact our customer support team on Facebook Messenger or Twitter (DM).
Thank you, Yvonne

data.text:
@LarryneMelh Hi @LarryneMelh, we apologise for the delay. We are still faced with a large number of requests.
Nevertheless, given your wish to leave at an early date we will forward your request to our customer service department. May you send us your booking n° please?

@kalpeshrana Hello @kalpeshrana, we regret this incident at the arrival of your flight. Did you make your report online via https://t.co/3hkfTenx5h
We remain at your disposal in private messaging / in DM if needed. Yvonne

urls.description: Air France vous indique comment procéder si votre bagage ne vous a pas été restitué à l'aéroport d'arrivée. Vos bagages ont été endommagés au cours d'un vol ? Air France vous conseille et vous informe.

data.text: @investor_bet Hello, we are sorry for this situation. We have received your DM. An agent will assist you as soon as possible. We remain at your disposal. Thank you ! Clémence.

@CaroLoganBooks Hello Caroline, we apologise for the delay and the inconvenience. We have checked and transferred your request to our customer service for priority treatment. We are sorry that we cannot provide you with a quicker response but we assure you that your request will be processed.
@Ashley68999715 Dear Ashley, may you send us your claim n° that we can check the actual status please? Thank you

@Arcee_TillAllr1 Hello @Arcee_TillAllr1, due to the current high volume of requests, response times are being extended. We apologise for this issue and assure you that our teams are doing their best to process each claim. We remain available for any further question. Yvonne

@CaroLoganBooks Hello Caroline, due to the current high volume of requests, response times are being extended. We apologise for this issue and assure you that our teams are doing their best to process each claim asap. Can you send us your booking n° please to check the status?

@tonyread11 Dear Tony, unfortunately the social network team is unable to provide you with any further information concerning your luggage. Have you ever tried calling the airport of your destination? We will do our best to deliver your baggage asap. Yvonne

@CaroLoganBooks Dear Carol, we apologise for the delay. We would like to advise you that claims are handled by the Customer Care Department. May you send us your claim number please to check the status? Thank you, Yvonne

@savthecupcake Good day Savannah, if you require specific assistance with your refund request for your inbound flight, we invite you to contact our customer support team on Facebook Messenger or Twitter (DM) with your booking number. 
Have a great day, Yvonne

data.text: @DavidoggyHogg Hello David, if you wish to request a refund for a ticket purchased at a travel agency, please contact your travel agency first. They have all the information necessary to process your refund. In case of any difficulties, our customer service remains at your disposal. Yvonne

@DeborahKerr2 Hi Deborah, we apologise for any inconvenience this may cause and will do our utmost to return your baggage to you as soon as possible. Please call our Air France Service Line +44 20 766 00 337 to get more information. Thank you

@tonyread11 Dear Tony, we apologise for the delay and the circumstances. Please contact our Service HOTLINE +44 20 766 00 337. Our team member will assist you to get your baggage asap! Thank you, Yvonne
@AsMirry Dear @sarraqin, can you communicate us your booking number please? Thank you

@sarraqin Hello @sarraqin, we are really sorry for this delay due to the success of the operation. We would like to reassure you that all claims will be issued .
I remain at your disposal. Yvonne

@tonyread11 Hi Tony, we apologise for the delay. To obtain information on the status of your baggage, we invite you to use our online tracing tool. We will do our best to deliver your baggage asap. Yvonne
@Elspeth00 Hi Elspeth, to obtain information on the status of your baggage, we invite you to use our online tracing tool. We will do our best to deliver your baggage asap. Yvonne

@gingewhinge2 Hi, we regret to read that. Did you contact our Baggage Service Team for further updates through this number +44 20 766 00 337? Our colleagues from the Baggage Service Team should be able to provide you with the sufficient details of the baggage. Yvonne

data.text: @Eamonn_Kerins Hi @Eamonn_Kerins, to obtain information on the status of your baggage, we invite you to use our online tracing tool. We will do our best to deliver your baggage asap. Yvonne
@srinidhi_82 Hello srinidhi, for a check-in you can use our "Airport Self Service" available at the airport. Have a nice flight and see you soon, Yvonne

@devjheeta Hello Dev, we understand your dissatisfaction.
As of today, your request is still being processed by our complaints department which will get back to you directly. It can take several weeks! We apologise for the delay. Yvonne
@tiarna_sp Dear Tiarna, our social media customer service is available via private message (DM). Thank you Yvonne

@MaxloweLtd Hello Diane, we regret this incident at the arrival of your flight. Did you make your loss report online? We remain at your disposal if needed. 
Good day, Yvonne

@stevenItUp Hello @stevenItUp, we apologise for the delay. To require specific assistance with your refund request, we invite you to contact our customer support team on Facebook Messenger with your booking number please! 
Have a great day, Yvonne

@GregRee51139510 Hi Greg, to obtain information on the status of your baggage, we invite you to use our online tracing tool. Unfortunately our social media customer service is unable to provide you with any further information. We will do our best to deliver your baggage asap. Yvonne
@JON_D84 Can you let us know your booking number via DM please ? Thank you

@devjheeta Hi @devjheeta, we understand your dissatisfaction.
As of today, your request is still being processed by our complaints department which will get back to you directly. Yvonne
@cmille101 Hello Christo, we well received your private message as well as your booking number and one of our team member will assist you asap ! Yvonne
@eshelman_s Hi Susan, to obtain information on the status of your baggage, we invite you to use our online tracing tool.  We will do our best to deliver your baggage asap. Yvonne

@JON_D84 Hello Jon, we apologise for the delay and the difficulty to contact us.  If you require specific assistance with your refund request, we invite you to contact our customer support team on Facebook Messenger. Thank you
@shalinisingh1 Dear @shalinisingh1, how can we assist ? Regards, Yvonne
@MsBearMurray Dear @MsBearMurray, we apologise for the delay. Please contact the baggage office at your arrival airport or customer service in your country of residence. Thank you, Yvonne

@missvanillia Dear @missvanillia, we apologise for the delay of your luggage. Please contact the baggage office at your arrival airport or customer service in your country of residence as we can't obtain further information via social networks. Thank you, Yvonne
@chandrakesh004 Dear @chandrakesh004, we apologise for the delay. Please contact the baggage office at your arrival airport or customer service in your country of residence. Thank you, Yvonne
@Gretche00540194 Dear @Gretche00540194, we apologise for the delay. Please contact the baggage office at your arrival airport or customer service in your country of residence. Thank you, Yvonne

@DeborahKerr2 Dear @DeborahKerr2, we apologise for the delay. Please contact the baggage office at your arrival airport or customer service in your country of residence as we can't obtain more information via the social networks. Thank you, Yvonne

@AmandaC_Jones Hello @AmandaC_Jones, if you require specific assistance with your booking, we invite you to contact our customer support team on Facebook Messenger or Twitter (DM).
Have a great day, Yvonne
